name: Areca Palm
description: A popular indoor plant with feathery, arching fronds that thrive in indirect light.

name: Snake Plant
description: Low-maintenance plant with upright, sword-like leaves; great for air purification.

name: Peace Lily
description: Known for its white blooms and air-purifying qualities; ideal for shaded spaces.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Trendy indoor tree with large, leathery leaves; prefers bright, indirect light.

name: Spider Plant
description: Easy to care for, with arching green leaves and baby plantlets.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Succulent with healing gel inside the leaves; needs minimal watering.

name: Money Plant
description: Believed to bring prosperity; grows well in water or soil.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Glossy-leaved houseplant that can grow quite tall with proper care.

name: Boston Fern
description: Lush green fronds make it perfect for hanging baskets in shaded spots.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Extremely hardy plant with shiny leaves; tolerates low light and neglect.
